Company: Office of Dr. Lee D. Pollan, DMD, PC.
Description of incident: The theft of the doctor's laptop may have exposed patient information.  The theft occurred sometime between November 6, 2012 and November 15, 2012.  Information related to patient names, dates of birth, addresses, Social Security numbers, diagnose and surgery billing codes, dates of service, and person responsible for the billing was on the laptop.
